name: Kitchen chaos (itch) (=Inlinecode=)
description:
Hello! welcome to kitchen chaos! You've been hired to keep food clean and get it ready for order

=============Controls/gameplay==============

- mouse to move hand

-left click to grab

-hold left click on sink to wash dirty hands

-drag food to green arrow (when not frozen) to fill in order

-you can "touch" germs but not dirty food without getting your hands dirty

-frozen food can't get dirty

-drag dirty food to the bin to bin it (wash your hands after!)
